profile.interests: Sports in general, mainly soccer and badminton. Nature and science, love to watch a good documentary. Tech in general, but mainly hardware and software. Movies, cooking and traveling.

skills.social: Through previous occupations I have gained a lot of experice working with different colleagues. I love to help others when I can, and if they have a need. Futhermore I am used to work with colleagues of a variaty of nationalities, so my usual work language is english. I value good colleagues, that likes to small talk over a cup of coffee.

professional.frontend: I have experience with the following frontend technologies: React, React Hooks, Redux, NextJS, Storybook, GraphQL, WCAG/A11Y, Webpack, Vite, HTML5, ES6, CSS3, Postcss, tailwindcss, XML, XSLT, AJAX og JSON.
professional.backend: I have experience with the following backend technologies: NodeJS, GOlang (Quite new to this)
professional.databases: I have some experience with SQL, but don't use it much lately
